name: PeerMe MultiSig: Unsign Action
title: Withdraw your signature
description: Withdraw your signature from a MultiSig proposal. This removes your approval and may prevent the proposal from reaching quorum. You can only unsign proposals you previously signed.

inputs.name: Action ID
inputs.description: The ID of the proposal to withdraw your signature from.

messages.success: Your signature has been withdrawn from proposal {{ACTION_ID}}.
